content:
Private, shared history stream created by Matteo Capucci (he/him). Description:

No description.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

No description.

  • New description:

One-way mirror of categories@mq.edu.au
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream categories mailing list to general: mailing list mirror.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

One-way mirror of categories@mq.edu.au

  • New description:

One-way mirror of categories@mq.edu.au, the official CT mailing list maintained by JS Lemay
Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the access permissions for this stream from Private, shared history to Web-public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream general: mailing list mirror to community: mailing list mirror.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
